attributes.action: pro-actively respond to the current crisis in Zimbabwe and bring real, International pressure to bear upon those who have led a nation into starvation and poverty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Help Zimbabwe.  It's time for CHANGE.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "pro-actively respond to the current crisis in Zimbabwe and bring real, International pressure to bear upon those who have led a nation into starvation and poverty."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17615


Prime Minister's Office
